Title: Relates to creating a company climate report system to assess the workplace environment of companies doing business in New York
Summary: Relates to creating a company climate report system to assess the workplace environment of companies doing business in New York with a focus on sexual harassment and discrimination policies and the frequency and handling of claims, settlements and cases by such companies.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to creating a company climate report system to assess the workplace environment of companies doing business in New York
